title: This Disabled Mother Says That The Coronavirus Outbreak Is Making Her Overcrowded Flat Unbearable
description: “In the house we feel like we're in a prison, trust me, suffocation,” Rekha Begum told BuzzFeed News. View Entire Post ›
content:
In the house we feel like we're in a prison, trust me, suffocation, Rekha Begum, who lives in Tower Hamlets, east London, tells BuzzFeed News.
